variable.name: windspeed
variable.description: Wind speed at the top of the canopy.

variable.name: soilEvap
variable.description: Rate of evaporation of water from the soil.

variable.name: solar
variable.description: Photosynthetically active radiation photon flux at the top of the canopy

variable.name: lat
variable.description: Latitude

variable.name: rh
variable.description: Relative humidity

variable.name: soil_bulk_density
variable.description: Mass of soil per volume of bulk soil.

variable.name: soil_water_content
variable.description: Volume of water per volume of bulk soil.

variable.name: soil_saturated_conductivity
variable.description: Conductivity of soil when soil_saturation_capacity is 1

variable.name: soil_saturation_capacity
variable.description: The maximum soil_water_content that the soil can hold.

variable.name: Leaf
variable.description: Dry mass of leaves per area of ground.

variable.name: Stem
variable.description: Dry mass of stems per area of ground.

variable.name: Root
variable.description: Dry mass of roots per area of ground.

variable.name: Sp
variable.description: Specific leaf area, one-sided leaf area per mass of leaf

variable.name: Sp_thermal_time_decay
variable.description: The rate at which Sp decreases

variable.name: iSp
variable.description: Initial value of specific leaf area when TTc is 0.

variable.name: TTc
variable.description: Thermal time as growing degree days.

variable.name: precipitation_rate
variable.description: Precipitation per time.

variable.name: b0
variable.description: Ball-Berry model intercept.

variable.name: b1
variable.description: Ball-Berry model slope.

variable.name: heightf
variable.description: The LAI per vertical height of the canopy
variable.notes: The units simplify to m^-1, but m^2 / m^2 is included for clarity with leaf area index.

variable.name: temp
variable.description: Air temperature

variable.name: leafwidth
variable.description: Leaf width

variable.name: canopy_assimilation_rate
variable.description: Canopy carbon assimilation rate on a ground-area basis

variable.name: canopy_transpiration_rate
variable.description: Canopy water transpiation rate on a ground-area basis

variable.name: Grain
variable.description: Mass of grain per ground area

variable.name: Rhizome
variable.description: Mass of rhizomes per ground area

variable.name: acceleration_from_gravity
variable.description: Accerlation from gravity

variable.name: lai
variable.description: Leaf area index

variable.name: Catm
variable.description: Atmospheric CO2 concentration

variable.name: vmax
variable.description: Maximum carboxylation rate of C4 photosynthesis.

variable.name: alpha
variable.description: Quantum efficiency of CO2 assimiliation for incident radiation.
variable.notes: This is for "incident" not absorbed radiation.

variable.name: kparm
variable.description: Slope of the roughly linear portion of an A-Ci curve.

variable.name: slope_water_vapor
variable.description: Slope of the saturation water vapor density vs air temperature curve.
variable.notes: It is also kg / m^3 / degrees C since it is a change in temperature.

variable.name: latent_heat_vaporization_of_water
variable.description: Latent heat of vaporization of water.

variable.name: saturation_water_vapor_pressure
variable.description: Vapor pressure of water that saturates the air's capacity.

variable.name: vapor_density_deficit
variable.description: The different between vapor density and saturated vapor density

variable.name: psychrometric_parameter
variable.description: Parameter to relate change in air temperature to air density

variable.name: soil_aba_concentration
variable.description: The concentration of ABA in the soil.
